mapper.select: select employee_id, employee_name, employee_papers_name, employee_papers_num, employee_nationnality, employee_card_regist_status from group1_gjj.employee where employee_id = #{employeeId}
select employee_id, employee_name, employee_papers_name, employee_papers_num, employee_nationnality, employee_card_regist_status from group1_gjj.employee limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into group1_gjj.employee(employee_name, employee_papers_name, employee_papers_num, employee_nationnality, employee_card_regist_status) values (#{employeeName}, #{employeePapersName}, #{employeePapersNum}, #{employeeNationnality}, #{employeeCardRegistStatus})
mapper.update:
update group1_gjj.employee
employee_name = #{employeeName},
employee_papers_name = #{employeePapersName},
employee_papers_num = #{employeePapersNum},
employee_nationnality = #{employeeNationnality},
employee_card_regist_status = #{employeeCardRegistStatus},
where employee_id = #{employeeId}
